quotes.title: Motivation
quotes.description: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.title: Motivation
quotes.description: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.title: Life
quotes.description: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.

quotes.title: Life
quotes.description: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

quotes.title: Success
quotes.description: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quotes.title: Success
quotes.description: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quotes.title: Happiness
quotes.description: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.title: Love
quotes.description: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

quotes.title: Love
quotes.description: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
